item.title: Meat Tenderiser
item.dc:creator: @money2442 money2442
item.description:
@money2442 wrote:

haha ok =p but i was going to try to make it hit higher =p but whatever thanks for hewlp guys[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2008, 04:30:21 PM[/size][hr]AHHHHHH the || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 747) didnt work…any more ideas??? and also public void bowSpecc()
{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861)
{
setAnimation(426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(15);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(15);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(15);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(426);
actionTimer = 4;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 1;
}
thats a mage long bow…can i just delete that and add it there? sense no one uses long ?

Read full topic

{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153)
{
setAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 0;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(50);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 0;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 1;

thats the g maul spec…if i want meat tenderiser to do same thing…do i makea new code and me it so where 4153 it would be 747?[/quote]Indeed. But you have to declare a new void, same information, but different name. Then declare it next to that void.

item.title: Meat Tenderiser
item.dc:creator: @money2442 money2442
item.description:
@money2442 wrote:

public void maulSpec()
{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153)
{
setAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 0;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(50);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 0;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 1;

thats the g maul spec…if i want meat tenderiser to do same thing…do i makea new code and me it so where 4153 it would be 747?

Read full topic
